Name: Anvil F7C-R Hornet Tracker Mk II
Description:
Manufacturer: Anvil Aerospace
Focus: Pathfinder
 
When seeking the next great frontier, who better to trust than a next-generation pathfinder? The F7C-R Hornet Tracker Mk II boasts an overhauled radar suite ideal for deep-space explorers who require depth and accuracy in their scan packages.
